H0.text: Which are the only mammals to have wings. Sugar Glider

H1.text: Which are the only mammals to have wings. Colugo

H2.text: Which are the only mammals to have wings. Flying Squirrel

H3.text: Which are the only mammals to have wings. Bat

A4.text: Bats are winged mammals; the only mammals capable of true and sustained flight.
